App Name: Fat Loss & Fitness
App Package Name: lose.flats.abswork.fatburn

Brief

Embark on your fitness journey with the Fat Loss & Fitness app, your digital personal trainer that is designed to cater to both beginners and professionals seeking a comprehensive workout regime. Shed pounds and shape your body effectively through targeted exercises that you can perform in the comfort of your home, tracking your progress every step of the way.
